external_games.name: Pinball Arcade: Season Six Pro Pack

name: Pinball Arcade: Season Six Pro Pack
summary:
Get all Twelve Season Six Pro pinball tables! The Pro Version of a tables gives you access to the table Operator’s Menu (allowing you to change many factory default settings), the ability to move the ball around the table at will, a mode that lets you move the camera around the table, and tips on playing the table from IFPA pinball pros.

Tables Included: Indianapolis 500, Big Hurt, Eight Ball Deluxe, Doctor Who, Doctor Who: Master of Time, Bone Busters, Jacks Open, Centigrade 37, Gladiators, Al's Garage Band Goes on a World Tour, Cactus Jacks, and Swords of Fury.
